name: Juice Making Simulator
description:
"Clone" of a game I played for a second on Roblox that I thought of remaking because it was satisfying: Fruit Juice Tycoon: Refreshed - Roblox

I was waiting on stuff with Steamworks so I can continue making my main project that I may or may not even post on Itch.

Buy trees in the shop, pick fruit in the garden, then juice them in the juicer to make money.

Bugs (I'm not fixing them):

  • One-time upgrades are purchasable multiple times, but don't do anything more
  • Picker visual doesn't represent the area it picks fruit in
  • Juicing too much fruit will cause the fruits to break out of the juicer
  • Lemon tree button text covers up the button, so you have to click under the text
  • Forgot to remove Debug.Log functions, so every frame every fruit in the garden will log its distance from the cursor

 I didn't put in a way to save data, so it'll reset if you relaunch the game.
